snippet.title: "Colors:Zero" Pre Alpha Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam : https://store.steampowered.com/app/2257750/ColorsZero
Website : www.colors-zero.com

Colors:Zero is an interactive storytelling set in a neo noir universe. Within a world of noir where colors have been erased, you will play as Walter Koch, a private investigator who has a post-cognition power. You will be assigned to investigate about strange murders in Shadeon City.

Demo Trailer : https://youtu.be/fco_UzC9Vz0
Pitch and Produce : https://youtu.be/VKek_7D1ZIw
Modular Characters : https://youtu.be/ukjuceVvIEU

Stay tuned :
Youtube : https://youtube.com/@ColorsZero
Twitter : https://twitter.com/ColorsZeroGame
Facebook : https://fb.com/colorszero
Instgram : https://instagram.com/colorszero/
Artstation : https://artstation.com/colorszero

Proud of winning an Epic MegaGrants !
And Reallusion Pitch and Produce !

Credits :
Designer & Developer : Cid
With the support of : Epic MegaGrants | Reallusion Pitch and Produce
Using : Unreal Engine | iClone | Character Creator | Unreal Live Link | Perception Neuron
Voice Talent : Daniel C. Johnson | Alice Himora | Dylan Runge | Chris Griesemer | Luna Freyava | CL Neal
Music : Matthew Pablo | Dark Fantasy Studio | Myuu | Vaan Fomm | Jmac | Aaron Kenny
Assistant Texture Artist : Nomejanahary Gaëlle | Ratovonanahary Faniry | Nomenjanahary Brayan
Assistant Motion Capture : Manda Miravaka | Josefa Solofoniaina
Tester : Stephanie Radifera
Additional Assets : 3D Total Textures | Only GFX | ZapSplat | Freepik | Pixabay
Speacial thanks to : Rasoarimanana Lucie

#ColorsZero #UnrealEngine #CharacterCreator #iClone
